thread.title: Admit it, they all do it!
thread.title_full: Admit it, they all do it!

title: Admit it, they all do it!
text:
(21892) 2015-08-10 6:18 
Bonjour Claude, Perhaps it's an age thing, but I have to confess that I've never taken a "selfie" and I suspect that you probably haven't either. But it's nice sometimes to have photographs of oneself, perhaps with partner or friends, when on holiday and nowadays it can be a bit risky asking a stranger to take your camera and take a photograph of you! This is an amazingly clear and sharp photograph considering that you took it at such a long exposure as 1/20 second on 200mm - you must either have a very, very steady hand or your lens has stabilisation - or perhaps you were just lucky. In any case, it's worked out very well with the two girls very clear and sharp against a nicely out of focus background. Excellent!
